falling-block-particles.config.title: Falling Block Particles Config
falling-block-particles.config.group.fal:
Adjust the chance for particles to spawn from the bottom of FallingBlocks.
Higher values make less particles spawn, lower values make more particles spawn

Minimum time particles can live for.
Final value is chosen randomly between Minimum Lifespan and Maximum Lifespan

Maximum time particles can live for.
Final value is chosen randomly between Minimum Lifespan and Maximum Lifespan
The time it takes for particles to shrink and disappear when landing on the ground
Delay before particles will shrink after landing on the ground
